title: How to Make a Bordered Card

steps.headline: Get 3 or 4 colors of markers.
steps.description: A 4th one is optional. 3 need to match, but the 4th can be any color you would like.

steps.headline: Get your paper.
steps.description: Cardstock is the best, but any white paper will do.

steps.headline: Fold your paper in half again.
Decide which way you're going to orient it.
Pick a color and border all four sides.
Repeat with the color you started with.
Add your message in the white space.
steps.description: Optional: Alternate colors for letters in the same pattern as you did the borders in.

steps.headline: Open the card up and draw a square with your lightest color.
steps.description: Make sure to leave good side margins. For portrait oriented cards draw it on the right side, for landscape oriented cards, bottom half.

steps.headline: Write your message in with the matching color of your choice.
Sign your name with the only color left.
Add a dotted border on the sides where you left margins.
OPTIONAL: With your non-matching color, flip to the back of the card, and add a "Designed By.." stamp.

text: Get 3 or 4 colors of markers. A 4th one is optional. 3 need to match, but the 4th can be any color you would like. Get your paper. Cardstock is the best, but any white paper will do. Fold your paper in half.  Fold your paper in half again.  Decide which way you're going to orient it. Landscape or portrait? Pick a color and border all four sides.  Repeat with a different color.  Repeat with a different color.  Repeat with the color you started with.  Add your message in the white space. Optional: Alternate colors for letters in the same pattern as you did the borders in. Open the card up and draw a square with your lightest color. Make sure to leave good side margins. For portrait oriented cards draw it on the right side, for landscape oriented cards, bottom half. Color the square in.  Write your message in with the matching color of your choice.  Sign your name with the only color left.  Add a dotted border on the sides where you left margins.  OPTIONAL: With your non-matching color, flip to the back of the card, and add a "Designed By.." stamp.  Finished.
